00017 #include "MisrFileQuery.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 #include <mfhdf.h>
00020 #include <HdfEosDef.h>
00021 #include <stdlib.h>
00022 #include <string.h>
00023 
00039 MTKt_status MtkFieldAttrList(
00040   const char *filename,    
00041   const char *fieldname,    
00042   int *num_attrs,          
00043   char **attrlist[]         )
00044 {
00045   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return status of this function */
00046   MTKt_status status;      /* Return status */
00047   int32 hdfstatus;         /* HDF-EOS return status */
00048   int32 fid = FAIL;    /* HDF-EOS File id */
00049 
00050   if (filename == NULL)
00051     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00052 
00053   /* Open HDF File */
00054   fid = GDopen((char*)filename, DFACC_READ);
00055   if (fid == FAIL)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDOPEN_FAILED);
00057 
00058   /* Get list of field attributes. */
00059   status = MtkFieldAttrListFid(fid, fieldname, num_attrs, attrlist);
00060   MTK_ERR_COND_JUMP(status);
00061 
00062   /* Close HDF file */
00063   hdfstatus = GDclose(fid);
00064   if (hdfstatus == FAIL)
00065     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDFEOS_GDCLOSE_FAILED);
00066   fid = FAIL;
00067 
00068   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00069 
00070 ERROR_HANDLE:
00071   if (fid != FAIL)
00072     GDclose(fid);
00073 
00074   return status_code;
00075 }
00076 
00082 MTKt_status MtkFieldAttrListFid(
00083   int32 fid,               
00084   const char *fieldname,    
00085   int *num_attrs,          
00086   char **attrlist[]         )
00087 {
00088   MTKt_status status_code;     /* Return status of this function */
00089   int32 n_attrs = 0;           /* Number of attributes */
00090   int32 count;                 /* Number of values in attribute */
00091   int32 HDFfid = FAIL;         /* HDF File ID */
00092   int32 sdInterfaceID = FAIL;  /* SD Interface ID (file level) */
00093   int32 sd_id = FAIL;          /* SDS ID (field level) */
00094   int32 sds_index = 0;         /* SDS index/offset for field */  
00095   int32 rank;                  /* Number of dimensions for field */
00096   int32 data_type;             /* Field data type */
00097   char name[MAX_NC_NAME];      /* SDS field name */
00098   intn hdf_status;             /* HDF return status */
00099   char attr_name[MAX_NC_NAME]; /* Name of attribute */
00100   int32 attr_index = 0;        /* Index of attribute */
00101   int32 hdf_datatype;          /* Attribute data type */
00102   char **attrlist_tmp = NULL;  
00103   int32 dim_sizes[H4_MAX_VAR_DIMS];
00104  
00105   if (fieldname == NULL || 
00106       num_attrs == NULL || attrlist == NULL)
00107     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00108 
00109   /* Transform HDF-EOS fid to plain HDF fid and SDS fid for file */  
00110   EHidinfo(fid, &HDFfid, &sdInterfaceID);  
00111   
00112   sds_index = SDnametoindex(sdInterfaceID, fieldname);
00113   sd_id = SDselect(sdInterfaceID,sds_index);  
00114   SDgetinfo(sd_id, name, &rank, dim_sizes, &data_type, &n_attrs);
00115   
00116   attrlist_tmp = (char**)calloc(n_attrs,sizeof(char**));
00117   if (attrlist_tmp == NULL)
00118     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_CALLOC_FAILED); 
00119   
00120   for (attr_index = 0; attr_index < n_attrs; ++attr_index)
00121   {
00122     /* Get attribute information */
00123     hdf_status = SDattrinfo(sd_id, attr_index, attr_name, &hdf_datatype, &count);
00124     if (hdf_status == FAIL)
00125       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_HDF_SDATTRINFO_FAILED);
00126 
00127     attrlist_tmp[attr_index] = (char*)malloc((strlen(attr_name) + 1) * sizeof(char));
00128     if (attrlist_tmp[attr_index] == NULL)
00129       MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_MALLOC_FAILED);
00130 
00131     strcpy(attrlist_tmp[attr_index],attr_name);
00132   }
00133   *attrlist = attrlist_tmp;
00134   *num_attrs = n_attrs;
00135   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00136   
00137   
00138 ERROR_HANDLE:
00139   if (attrlist_tmp != NULL)
00140     MtkStringListFree(n_attrs, &attrlist_tmp);
00141 
00142   if (num_attrs != NULL)
00143     *num_attrs = -1;
00144 
00145   return status_code;
00146 }
